question: Which among the following is/ are correct about the status of Tobacco and Tobacco products under the Goods and Services Tax?
option1: Taxes can be levied on those products under GST
option2: Central excise duty can be levied on those products
option4: Tobacco products are excluded from GST
explanation: Taxes can be levied on Tobacco and Tobacco products under GST and Central excise duty can also be levied on those products by the centre.
